content: Can you provide me with a list of five schools that offer online courses in a table format? The table should include the following columns: School Name, Course Offerings, Tuition Fees, Accreditation, and Contact Information.

Here's a table with five schools that offer online courses:

| School Name                | Course Offerings                          | Tuition Fees                     | Accreditation                   | Contact Information                  |
|----------------------------|-------------------------------------------|----------------------------------|----------------------------------|--------------------------------------|
| University of Phoenix      | Business, Education, Healthcare, IT       | Varies by course and program     | Higher Learning Commission       | www.phoenix.edu/contact              |
| Southern New Hampshire Univ| Business, Arts, Science, IT, Psychology   | $960/undergraduate course        | New England Commission of Higher Education | www.snhu.edu/contact                 |
| Coursera (Partnered with universities)| Data Science, Computer Science, Business | Varies by course                 | Depends on partner university    | www.coursera.org/contact            |
| Arizona State University   | Engineering, Business, Language, Health   | $561–$1,343 per credit hour      | Higher Learning Commission       | www.asuonline.asu.edu/contact        |
| edX (Partnered with universities)| Computer Science, Business, Humanities | Varies by course                 | Depends on partner university    | www.edx.org/contact                  |

Please note that tuition fees can vary based on specific courses and programs, and it's best to contact the institutions directly for the most accurate and up-to-date information.
